CLOSED.title: Store closing
CLOSED.description: Thank you for coming, we will be back as soon as possible!

RESTED.title: Store suspension of service
RESTED.description: Thank you for your visit, our shop is currently on vacation, we will come back as soon as possible.

want-to-open-store: I want to open a shop too
product-is-discontinued: Oops! This product has been discontinued.

page-not-found.title: It looks like the page does not exist
page-not-found.message: Please double check that the URL is correct.

server-error.title: Un oh! It seems that something is broken
server-error.message: We are working hard to repair, thank you for your patience
